Item ID10296

An Adamant helm (h1) is a helmet that can be obtained by completing medium Treasure Trails. It requires 30 Defence to equip and has the same defence bonuses as an Adamant full helm.

Just like the rest of Treasure Trails armoury, this cannot be made via the Smithing skill. Players might wield it because of its unique design.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-6-3
 Defence bonuses
+19+21+16-1+19
 Other bonusesSlot
+0+0+0%+0List

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 April 2021
(update)

The helmet's ranged attack bonus has been decreased from -2 to -3.

An '''Adamant helm (h1)''' is a helmet that can be obtained by completing [[Clue scroll (medium)|medium]] [[Treasure Trails]]. It requires 30 [[Defence]] to equip and has the same defence bonuses as an [[Adamant full helm]].

Just like the rest of Treasure Trails armoury, this cannot be made via the [[Smithing]] [[skill]]. Players might wield it because of its unique design.
